special_text:
[+1]: Create a 1/1 white Cleric creature token. You lose 1 life.
[0]: You get an emblem with “As long as you control an Angel creature or a Jorah planeswalker, you can’t lose the game and
your opponents can’t win the game.”
[-1]: Until your next turn, target nonland permanent loses all abilities and can’t attack or block.
